name.31: Holiday Inn Express Hamburg-St. Pauli Messe
name.34: Cordes AKZENT Hotel & Restaurant am Rosengarten

0.text: Great hotel. Great rooms! The beds are always so comfortable at Sofitel. Nothing wrong with this hotel & spa, but one point they're not doing well is the reception. The waiting times are just too long. So make sure you're ahead of your schedule and calculate the time lost when waiting to be served. It seems they need to shortened the check-in/out procedures and have more people at the reception. Other than this one constructive criticism, enjoy your stay!
Beautiful hotel , very clean . Big rooms . We loved the hotel and its close to all the shopping area.

On of my favorites in Hamburg. Modern and very spacious rooms and architecture overall. 
The beds are very comfortable and the rooms quiet. The only thing to mention is that air-conditioning can be loud.
The gym is small but very functional. Food/ Bar and Restaurant are great.
Stayed in this hotel on a business trip. Great hotel! Rooms are spacious and allow you to have a working space in the room. Spa is great. And the best - is the restaurant! Great drinks and food!
Nice room, not enough staff to cover the front desk. Good location

1.text: Bit dated style and not too big rooms but overall very nice hotel!
Good and clean rooms, good breakfast, friendly staff..
A very good stay. Clean and the personnel is very friendly.
Good hotel with good facilitis, friendly and helpful staff, good breakfeast and close to central Hamburg, parks and u-Bahn.
I received a very warm welcome by the staff that was helpful and attentive to details all the way during my staying. Really easy to recommend this hotel to other people

2.text: Great hotel in central Hamburg.  Good roomsand facilities.  Only downside is the breakfast could be improved.  Overall would recommend
Great design hotel with nice rooms. Good service and delicious breakfast.

This hotel is really great, staff is superp so sweet and very helpful... we are staying at this hotel for our one year anniversary, and it's great for that. Romantic, modern and right in the middle of Hamburg. Restaurant is Great, and affordable, spa, pool and sauna is great. Fitness is okay, but if you are training for strength, not so much. But have the basics. All in all. 9/10 ... would visit again.

Really nice rooms, and the meals incredible. The breakfast is just perfect and all the meals we did there were perfect too. The rooftop bar is really nice to drink something, and the attention from the staff was absolutely perfect, specially Katherin, who was very attentive with us. Thanks Side Hotel!

An 8-minute walk from Hamburg Dammtor train station, this ultra-contemporary, glass-sided hotel is 1 km from the Kunsthalle Hamburg museum. 

Minimalist rooms with a chic atmosphere have free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, entertainment systems and minibars. Upgraded rooms add Nespresso machines. Some come with kitchenettes. Suites add partitioned living areas and city views.

A breakfast buffet has a surcharge. There's a stylish steakhouse with a bar. Additional amenities include a sleek, vibrantly colored spa, offering treatments for a fee, with a gym and an indoor pool, plus 9 meeting rooms with a connecting rooftop terrace lounge.

3.text: Very clean. Spacious. Had a couch which didn't look cramped into the room. Had a kettle and some complementary packets of tea and coffee. Also the water is free in the minibar. Would suggest that the hotel add some complementary toothpaste and tooth brush. Then it would be a 5 star review.

Great, modern hotel with incredibly comfortable beds. I love the bathrooms with a huge rain shower, the team is super friendly and the breakfast is amazing. The wellness and fitness area is well stocked and clean. Nothing to complain.
We liked a lot. Close to all main attraction even by walk about 20 minutes. Staff was very helpfull. Good breakfast.

A good hotel, quiet and just the right distance from the main city center. I recommend getting the breakfast, but the dinner is a bit of a RIP off so for that go somewhere else. Good drinks in the bar tho.
Great hotel with great service and a great ethos. Keep it up.

4.text:
We had a very nice couple of days at the Madison Hamburg this fall. It's the 3 time we visit the hotel, within the last three years.
Our daughters wanted to stay at The Madison again, and so we did. It was great as always - This time we also decided to give the Marley's Restaurant a try, and it was truly amazing food. Well cooked, tasty and fresh. We would love to come back again next year ;o)
Excelent, we had a very nice stay. Good location. I could walk to all my appointments.
Nothing negative. Very friendly staff willing to assist. Superb rooms.
Everything was perfect and as expected. We will be back soon!
Great service, good food. Meeting rooms are very nice.

5.text: I had an absolutely amazing stay here. The staff was helpful and friendly. In fact I was greeted by name everytime I came through the lobby! It's close to everything and the room was perfect and clean upon arrival.  The breakfast was also a highlight. Do yourself a favor and stay here if you ever find yourself in Hamburg!
It was a nice hotel.  We were a group of 20.   None of us was able to get the WiFi working in the rooms.   It only work from the reception.   Other than that, it was a nice hotel.
Stayed for a night and I did enjoy every bit of my time. Great i door pool and restaurant. Breakfast is amazing too.

If you are a smoker, they have a smoking lounge, which is great. The people that work at the hotel, are super nice, and service minded. The food at the restaurant is great as well. Traditionel german food.

This was my 9th business trip to Hamburg in as many months and this is unfortunately the worst accommodation I have stayed in.

Starting with the positives, the staff are lovely and the breakfast is quite good. These positives however do not outweigh the room quality. The rooms were  unacceptable in my opinion (and I do not have high expectations when it comes to accommodation). I was not concerned by how dated the room was (the carpets and furniture are very old and heavily stained which may deter some people), but the smell, heat and noise are what I found to be unacceptable.

Smell - upon arrival I assumed I had been given a smoking room by mistake as the smell was so overwhelmingly pungent. I went back to reception and was advised that there are no smoking rooms. There was no remediation possible, each night of my stay I had to go to the hotel, open the window, and leave for an hour to allow the smell to dissipate; it by no means eradicated it, but it was at least manageable. Looking around the room there is signage requesting customers not to empty their ash tray into the waste paper bin so my assumption of the smell is that the carpets / furnishings have not been changed since the time when it was a smoking room and the smell has lingered ever since.

Heat - the hotel is not air conditioned or sufficiently ventilated. They provided a desktop fan which I was able to put on the coffee table to circulate air but it merely circulated hot air and I repeatedly woke up covered in sweat.

Noise - this would not have been an issue if the heat was not so bad, but the heat meant I had to open the window, and the outside noise from opening the window was significant. My room was not facing the central station as others have commented however the noise levels were still high, particularly in the early morning.

Overall, I had minimal sleep during my 3 nights here which is far from ideal for a business trip. I would encourage visitors to stay in one of the many other hotels in the city as I have not had the issues above with any other hotel in Hamburg.

6.text:
Stayed for 4 nights.
Very happy with the room, good size, clean, all amenities needed.
Spa downstairs has a pool, jacuzzi and sauna, robes and slippers are from reception. 
Hotel is in a good location to access the whole city by foot.
Fantastic location, great newly decorated rooms and service is very attentive! Coming back for sure!
Stayed many times, always clean and tidy. Very modern and the staff are excellent!
We had a family room which was very nice. Nice bar, wellness area and staff, and the location is perfect. All in all a very good experience

Located at 600m distance from St. pauli and at 200m distance from Michaeliskrische stop. Near to St. Michael's church and groscher market. 
Good food, good service, friendly staff, cozy rooms, properly maintained. All facilities like washing machine with drier, dish washer, hair drier, bath tub. Big lobby with fire  warming the room, TV provided in apartment. They clean room everyday and also used dishes. Room, hall, kitchen with dinning table and also study table. Microwave and induction with all utensils are provided. Amenities like gym and swimming pool with warm water is also there.
Overall a very good hotel to stay. Bit costly but a good option.If you are looking for something to stay in a good place, this is a good option. Near to reeperbahn (party place of hamburg). Lot of vegetarian options are also available nearby- like loving hut restaurant.

7.text:
I loved this hotel and all its service, great conditions and quality of comfort. I call attention to her professional employees, namely Yolanda, for whom I had the pleasure of being treated, with great professionalism and that impressed me, since she could speak Portuguese which is my native language, and made me feel at home since the beginning.
I recommend this hotel

A typical business Hotel, walking distance to downtown Hamburg and a public transport station right next door.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful and the breakfast with a wide range of fresh options. The beds are very comfortable and you may order pillows to your personal liking from the pillow menu. There is quite some construction going on around the hotel. I changed my room due to the noise and discovered that not all standard rooms are equipped equally, but all offer a kettle and coffee and tea selection. The rooms lack atmosphere due to the fact that they don't have wall paper but are just painted in white.

The hotel location is great - it is close to railway station and other key locations. The view from window in the rooms located on higher floors is nice. Beds are comfortable. Breakfast buffet offers variety of dishes. WiFi works pretty well if you need to work. I am not sure about other rooms, but mine looked a little bit like a hospital room - very bright colors, no carpets, a bit old-fashioned design of furniture. Changing a couple of things to make them a bit warmer / cozy could help in the future.
Great view. Nice room. Took a while to check in, but was busy so not a negative. Bed was a bit soft
So CLEAN, so polished, great shower, good breakfast, nice polite staff. The location is next to the train station and close to University of Hamburg.

8.text:
Unfortunately for people that are very sensible to sounds in the night there is a ventilation system, additional to the air conditioning that is manageable by the guest, through the rooms that cannot be shut down and it is not silent. Therefore one cannot really sleep well.

The staff of the hotel was very nice offering other rooms, but it seems that the ventilation system is in every room. The 3 stars are for the staff, otherwise due to the noisy ventilation system I would not give more than 1.
Lovely and clean. Staff very helpful. Breakfast good

Room are nice but cold and we had to ask for heating in the middle of the night. The floor manger was helpful and offered us to move to a different room which was warmer snd bigger.
Breakfast was ok, good variety but short on vegetables.

Cosy little hotel that's placed in a good central area close to good restaurants and coffee shops and a nice stroll away from the harbour. Bed is comfortable, room is clean and staff are nice and helpful!
This hotel offers wonderfull suites. We enjoyed our stay here. Please remember parking your vehicle in the parking lot on the other site of the road is cheaper that the hotel !!!!

9.text: What an amazing hotel, were surprised by cake as it was our Honeymoon was so sweet and the Tower bar is so fantastic with happy hour. The room was really well sized with a great view over the whole complex. The diner was great so much food for what you pay and the breakfast buffet is so large and varied.
What a perfect place to stay. Highly recommended. And do not skip breakfast.

I don't know why it's a 4 star I would say 3 star at best. The whole place smells like a smoker friendly bar to include non-smoking room. I had to stand in smoke just to check in because their small smoke filled bar by the counter had its door open letting the smoke out. To get the cart with our luggage to the elevator I had to go down a ramp where I smashed mu hand on the wall because of how tight the turn was. I was here to catch the Queen Mary 2 in the morning as I do every other year, but I will stay somewhere else next trip. WORST STAY EVER!

The hotel is ok but not what you expect for a four star hotel. The interior looks quite outdated, and the design is far from being modern. Nevertheless, the location is good and for a few nights it can be a perfect stay. However, I was quite annoyed that from 9.30 am onwards on a public holiday the housekeeping was super loud in the hallway, the doors were slapped strongly and made a lot of noise. Housekeeping also came into the room twice despite the do-not-disturb sign. Then, around 11.45 am I received a phone call from some very annoyed person stating that check out is at 11 am. I thought it is at 12 bit still, no reason to be picked out if the room in such an unfriendly manner. Overall, a good hotel for a short stay but too expensive for what it's worth.
Location is very good. Rooms are very clean. Plenty restaurants and one of them has a terrace with sea view.

10.text:
Clean room. Staff is very friendly. Restaurant downstairs for breakfast and late supper are both notably good. Limited menu on dinner but they also have items for kids which is a plus. Takes about 15 minutes to walk to the main shopping area. Not complicated just use your phone. 
July 2018: rooms are undergoing renovations. You can hear the repairs and workers starting at about 10am. Just an FYI. Look forward to returning and seeing the new rooms.
The room was very nice and with very details, but the hotel is very far of the center of the city

Expected more from a mercure. Staff is friendly and nice although, they need to communicate better between departments. It could be due to new staff and the refurbishment they where in. A bit expensive the food if you go for a lunch or a dinner. Apart from that, rooms are nice and comfy
Nice hotel, clean, and everything works. Friendly staff.
Clean room. Nice and friendly staff.

11.text: Good and cozy place for a work event in the cinema room. Good service, drink and food. Staff was super friendly.

For starters the staff is great! Spoke great English and was very helpful. The Superbude is also in a great location, easy to get everywhere by foot,bike, or taxi. The theme of the hotel was awesome and fun and the rooms were super clean and cool. An overall awesome atmosphere here, great for everyone!
Small but clean rooms which are individually designed. Great stuff and nice flair. The train station is just around the corner and it takes only a few minutes to get to the center.

We liked the rooms (very clean and well equipped), the breakfast (tasty, loads of variety, until 12 noon!) and the staff (very welcoming, easy going, open minded). 
They create an atmosphere where single travelers as well as families feel welcome. They are easy going and friendly, not stressed out and very services minded. It's very well equipped and near to the station where you can catch a train to the city center in no time.  Definitely worth staying there and a clear recommendation.

Some of it is not too far away from the city centre great place to stay and have a drink. As the name says it is just a hostel - It is quite simple but enough for your needs if you're only staying for a short while.

12.text: A great breakfast and professional facade can't hide the fact that this hotel 'benefits' from being just off the Reeperbahn. Not all rooms have the great views of Hamburg that can be had from the Sky Bar. As someone who doesn't drink and intends to keep my wedding vows, I felt thoroughly out-of-place. The rooms are spacious, but oddly lacking in comfort compared to a Premier Inn. Then again, I don't suppose you're expected to work at your desk when you stay here. If a condom in your complimentary amenities bag makes you feel uncomfortable, then this is not the hotel for you.

Unique hotel with amazing views from the Upper floor rooms and the bar. Close to the party district and the harbour. Rooms are clean, a bit small. Breakfast and both bars are amazing. No decent fitness center and sauna, but a run along the river is a good workout option. Reception staff a bit rude sometimes, which is in line wit mh their edgy/hipster branding. Bar and restaurant staff excellent. Conference centre is OK, bad acoustics though.

Excellent hotel - below average service, especially at the bar on the top floor. Eventhough i only had a casual elegant vest I had to leave it at the wardrobe which caused quite some trouble. Very rude, unusual-Hamburg staff.

It is all a facade. Looks fancy but expensive, bad service, ordinary rooms. You can't even pay by card at the bar. Not a place unless you're really want the view.  But be careful. The view might not be what the room name tells you. River side view. Yes you might see a part of it... Don't stay here!

Friendly staff. Basic rooms with little thought of how a traveler uses a room. Example is putting the shaving mirror on the opposite side of the bathroom to the sink. Would try other hotels in the area before returning.

13.text: Well, quite a nice place to stay for 2-4 days. Reasonable price, quite comfortable location in the Outer Center. Recommended
Lovely hotel. Designed in an amazing, modern and tasteful style. Service at the highest level 😊👌👍 Thank you very much
Good position, good breakfast, lovely room. They should pay attention just a little bit on cleaning but everything else was perfect
Small but nice room. The personal was very helpful. We might come back.

Great Hotel, would stay again. Close to 2 Trains stations walking distance and the area is nice and quite yet well located. Room was awesome, we had a very large room with a big bed and a sofabed, had 2 closets, a nice bathroom, parking on the premises at a reasonable price of fifteen euros a night.
Didn't have the breakfast was seemed too expensive, pp rather wento to a Coffee shop which in Germany is easy to find.

14.text: The hotel is very nice. Stayed for 2 night, good breakfast and friendly staff. Nice rooms, big and clean. Drove my own car so it wasn't a problem to go to the city. But it's located kinda far away. Would stay here again.
Good location, decent bar and restaurant. Great staff, great welcome.

Sub Standard for a 4 star hotel in Hamburg: waited about 10 minutes to get my room. Staff seemed overwhelmed and inexperienced. On my second stay, the toilet wasn't cleaned. Breakfast was good, though. Minibar prices are outrageous.
Friends staff, Clean rooms, good location, good parking

A perfectly acceptable place to stay. Bit out of the way for sightseeing in the city centre if you're relying on public transport. Excellent food in the restaurant. Rooms are a decent size and the bed is comfy. WiFi a tad patchy in the rooms at the end of the corridors.

15.text: Within walking distance. Ten/Fifteen minutes. But easy to get lost and could be better signposted or marked out on map, Ideal for terminal. Modern design with comfortable rooms. Staff excellent and helpful. Brian.
Not bad for one night. It seems it is close to the airport but you won't hear any plane noise which is nice. The room are normal, cleans and they have new smart tvs.

Nice hotel within walking distance of the terminal. 15 minutes walk at brisk tempo so not for everyone. I guess a taxi wouldn't cost much.
Free WiFi and breakfast is available at extra cost. Also a gas station close by plus a Burger King if that's your thing.
Rooms are sparsely furnished, but bed is very comfortable in my opinion. Shampoo/shower gel is provided and the shower was nice.
No coffee and tea making facilities though, hence not 5 stars.
Staff was super friendly and helpful. A nice place to stay for a night or two. Reasonably priced.
Perfect place in the near for airport. Nice staff and good sweet breakfast at 5.30 in the morning 😂🤗

A good hotel with a walking distance from airport. Rooms cleaned every day, a best choice who travel transit, or for a short stay. Room service and front desk is good. Quality equals to price offered. Restaurant is good and not so costly. Wide variety of dishes offered.

16.text:
I loved this hotel and all its service, great conditions and quality of comfort. I call attention to her professional employees, namely Yolanda, for whom I had the pleasure of being treated, with great professionalism and that impressed me, since she could speak Portuguese which is my native language, and made me feel at home since the beginning.
I recommend this hotel
Very professional staff. The rooms are VERY quiet and spacious. There’s an small gym and spa. Perfect hotel for an early flight.
Very nice stay; the staff is pleasant.

Most of the staff here are friendly but the restaurant staff are quite rude. I was having lunch in an empty area of the restaurant and an elderly lady told me off for not sitting in the alloted table(which was full). Whatever happened to "customer is the king"?
Great hotel bar, awesome bartender - very nice clean rooms

17.text: friendly staff quiet rooms and a cool horse racing  track next door
Nice hotel specially considering the price. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Breakfast was fine with many options.

Good 4 star hotel, directly at the Rennbahn, where the horse races take place. Good breakfast, clean rooms. Take a room looking to the race track, rooms on the front maybe a bit noisy, due to the big street in front of the hotel.

Lololol is the best way I can describe the edge of the bed and I will be there at the same time I don't have a car so I can get a ride to the airport on Friday and will do it when I'm sooooorry the best time I was at a party and play games or B's with casual running around with a ride with casual and play some pool table is ready and will have it done in a couple hours to go I have a few things I would do you think I could be alright with me baby I know I'm sorry

18.text: Long overdue review I ought to share, especially my positive experience during my stay there a couple of years back. Hands down one of the best hotels I stayed in western Europe. Standard rooms are extremely well equipped, clean and spacious. I've stayed in many hotels in western europe, many of them rated 4* or 5*, but this Novotel in Hamburg is THE standard. Staff are attentive and efficient. The layout is great and so was the breakfast.
nice 4 star hotel directly located at an underground station. clean and cosy rooms with well isolated doors.

Comfortable hotel with a very nice lounge, good WiFi. Avoid the very expensive breakfast and explore the neighborhood for niche Cafe's. Train station right outside the hotel entrance which is very convenient. Very clean and not loud.
This is a great hotel in a nice neighbourhood with east access into the city centre.  Friendly, helpfull & spotless.  We are very happy with this hotel.
Nice large rooms. Unfortunately the aircondition was not working so my room was at 26 degree Celsius

19.text: Nice and comfortable. Very pleasant and friendly staff. 👍 Only missing air condition...
Room was nice, staff very receptive and friendly, food superb, only downside is the WiFi, totally a waste, fix ure WiFi and ure a 5 pointer hotel.

Outdated, much too far from city center with bad and complex public transport connection. In summer the floor heating stays on leading too extremely hot room. No shops or restaurants nearby and bar and restaurant are closed on Sunday! Overrated.
Clean rooms and friendly staff. Very good breakfast and restaurant. Single rooms are a bit small and the way to Hamburg centre with public transportation is quite long.
Nice cosy place, very attentive and cordial staff, good breakfast. Rooms are a bit strangely setup with a lot of corners! A very big parking lot. Overall a good experience.

20.text: Great hotel in a nice neighborhood. The rooms are stylish and the service is good.
Great Staff, good bed and shower. Location very handy with a Ubahn station 4 min walk away. What more can you ask for

Nice hotel with simple and stylish interior in a quiet area. It's very close to the Kaifu bad and Kaifu lodge (both access the same pools) with gym, pools, saunas, etc.. which makes it a very attractive location if you want to do some sport after work.

Great location and gorgeous facade attracted me to Yo Ho....and the name! Fabulous staff and the room was more than adequate, clean & comfy.
Thank you
Great hotel with friendly staff who swiflty arranged luggage storage, wake-up call, and taxi. All in all a perfect experience.

21.text: Very nice restored industrial place to a state of the art venue and hotel. Looks from the inside a bit like Alcatraz but real nice and good atmosphere. Perfect place for business events as I was their for a TOPdesk customer event.

The hotel is excelent, with nice spacious rooms and very good interior design. 
The negative side is that there in no outer space at the rooms and the light in the rooms is insufitient. They are very dark -night and day. It is very difficult to read or do something with that amount of light.
Nice hotel in more quite part of Hamburg. Rooms beautifully incorporated into the old industrial setting. A bit too expensive breakfast for what's in the offer. Had a good stay there.
Great design Hotel. Staff was friendly. Breakfast buffet a bit poor but there for I got perfect fried eggs.
Stylish hotel. Comfy beds. Great shower. Need washcloth and better power outlet access.

22.text: Amazing (!!!) place! Breakfast left me speechless, it was that good!
Great hospitality, kids friendly and the breakfast is delicious
Very clean and charming , above average breakfast. Discreet staff, hardly notice them in a nice way.
Clean rooms, very good restaurant. In smoking area some staff are very unfriendly. Quiet high prices.

23.text: Very nice hotel with friendly staff, nice rooms, good position and perfect view from upper floors. There is hotel parking garage. City center is 15 min walking. S bahn/U bahn just few min walking away. Extremely nice park just across the street. Check it.

Near to Hamburg Dammtor this Mercure can be found. I booked this hotel without breakfast, but the restaurant looked very nice. Sleeping quality was high, because the rooms are isolated very well. Unfortunately the desks are quite small, so working with a laptop is not very easy. I would book it again.
Nice clean and quiet hotel in close proximity to the city centre. I would recommend walking over to Schlump to take the U-bahn into city centre. Otherwise a friendly staff and a recommended hotel!

The air conditioning actually works here! Quiet, understated hotel, well positioned. During the summer, choose this place before other well known brands Radisson and Marriott. Their AC in Hamburg does not work. You'll pay for an uncomfortable night. Not at this place!
The room is clean the the bed is really comfy, we order food service and they are really. Tasty and fair price!

24.text: Lovely restaurant on the ship. I really liked the idea. Friendly waiters, delicious food. I first tried the crab soup, I recommend!
A special place, the jazz night gives you an opportunity to see true passion for jazz :)
Interesting restaurant on a British built lightship. Good food with local specialities.
It might be a tourist trap...but the food is good and the view is nice. Usually crowded
Food was good. Outside was closed due to lack of staff.

25.text: Very cosy and generous rooms, excellent bed madrasses, pillows and sheets.It was a very nice bathroom. Gentle and helpful staff. Impressive house and nice nature surronding it.
Tolles, sehr einzigartiges Hotel mit gemütlichen Zimmern! Alles war sauber, der Service sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Sehr gerne wieder! Frühstück war auch sehr lecker und eine große Auswahl.
Gemütlich, gute Küche und freundliche Bedienung. Traditionelles Ambiente in sehr schöner Lage. Für größere Feiern und Gruppen gut geeignet, nur etwas höheres Preisniveau.

26.text:
Great atmosphere. really great food. not good enough bar personal nor waiters.  Some of our drinks were not just quite right, which you should expect with that price level. Far from the quality and service you get at Copenhagen quality drinks bars.
 Too long waiting time for our food.

Nice food. Very impressive tuna tatar for starters! Chef’s sushi selection for main was so so. Actually I was a bit dissapointed. Agree with some of the other reviews: The waiters were polite but made a lot of mistakes.
Great food, very nice atmosphere and friendly staff! Prices are a little high, but quality of the food follows along nicely.

It's one of my favourites in Hamburg.  The sushi here is exceptional. Ialways go for the sushi boat. Ask your waiter for good wine pairing.  
It is abit pricey but it's exceptional food,  fantastic ambience and great service.
Food is amazing!! Atmosphere is really cool as there is a large open space in the middle and then more intimate tables within the 'cave' areas. Would definitely recommend!

27.text: Nice place To stay.  Nice bar and restaurant. Very smart room. Far from main city Hamburg.

Hot weather, no AC and mosquitoes waiting for us to open the window made our night a nightmare. I guess it would pay off to party ale night and then sleep on the bench somewhere. The morning would feel the same, one would save a lot of money and have some good time.
The kitchen closes at 9 pm and if you arrive later and insist on eating, you will get Kari wurst, bread with something and a very strong feeling that you're an obstacle on the staff's way home (even though the bar is still open and has its own menu).
Breakfast was good, but I don't enjoy breakfasts that much after partying hard.

Great hotel with impressive value.  The hotel feels contemporary but in a very old building.  High ceilings in the rooms make them feel far more spacious.  Bathrooms have large showers with generous shower flow.  Breakfast range and quality was excellent.

Very nice hotel with refined dining in cellar restaurant. Themed rooms. 

Watch out for heavy traffic round Hamburg.

28.text:
Tasty brakefasts.
Would be nice if hotel had a gym or at least some simple fitness equipment
Beautiful hotel. Great restaurant. The steaks simply awsome
Very clean and fresh Hotel with lovely breakfast and helpful and kind staff!

We liked the place very much. The standard of the room was excellent, very clean and met our expectations. The staff were polite and accommodating.I highly recommend this place. The only negative thing was that you had to walk through the restaurant to exit the hotel from your room, which could be awkward at dinner service.

29.text: The cleaning took place while having breakfast at 8.30, and was not finished at return. That is not ok. Got locked out because there were nobody at the reception. Besides that a nice hotel.
Very clean and pleasant. The staff was kind and accommodating. We appreciated the complimentary coffee and sparkling water in the hotel room
Nice business hotel. Quick checkin and out with a very good breakfast. When I was there outside temperature was 37C. Maybe next time an aircondition will welcome me.

Good points are that it is right opposite the train station so convenient for a steam trip to Brocken and close to the attractive town centre. Managed to park in their overflow across the road. Evening meals were very good and the delivery of drinks to your table by model railway was special. Room clean and shower fantastic. Downside was that there is no Aircon and it is on a road junction so the windows have to remain closed because of noise. It was hot and difficult to sleep.

30.text: Great food and service and lovely surrounding
Nice Location, the waiters are very kind. We were in the basement to celebrate a marriage.
Old fashioned but nice and great food

Typical German food. Well cooked snd well served.  The service is excellent and the ambiente as well. It is well worth its price.  And if you feel like going for a drink after dinner   their bar is excellent
The hotel is nice but I guess it's too expensive for what we get. The wifi access should be better and there should be air conditioning in the rooms.

31.text: Staff was amazing and tried to fix our broken AC problem. However, the beds were bouncy and double bed size instead of queen. No hot breakfast unless you like a boiled egg. No sausages or scrambled eggs. Not enough seats for breakfast either; need at least 5-6 more tables as it was very busy even outside and people had to wait. The free  ice machine was a good idea, but a water bottle filling station is needed as you cannot fill up your water bottle in the room. There is underground parking for a fee, has a couple of elevators, and the location of the hotel is excellent; close to the St. Pauli U-bahn, the Reeperbahn, great restaurants within walking distance, and in August, there was an enormous fair going on with rides, games, and food. Three stars because of the broken AC  and the loud noise emitting from it when it was 36C outside and we really needed to cool down after a day of sightseeing. Hard to sleep because of it and finally had to shut it off, open the window and suffer in the heat.
Close to a fair,  walking distance to Reeperbahn as well.  Had a free breakfast and ice, which isn't common in a lot of German hotels.  Vending machines were reasonably priced.

Absolutely dreadful value for money. For starters they didn't take care of our request to have a queen size bed (or two beds joined together), at the reception they told us that if we wanted we could have moved the beds ourselves and put them together. Too bad that the room is so small that's almost impossible to do this, and if you do, you have to jump over mattresses to reach the bathroom. Breakfast was among the worst I've seen in Germany, poor choices of everything and crowded. Location is good, parking is convenient but maybe a little expensive.

myself and 2 friends shared 1 room. I will admit it was tight quarters but we made it work. the front desk staff accomodated us with extra pillows and blanket. Unfortunately the towels were super small.
Great location just off the Reeperbahn.   Staff were up for it and we had a good stay.

32.text: It was an ok experience as it was under construction to expand. I guess it will get one more star once it's done with that. The breakfast is decent and the people who run this place are nice people.
Clean, cooperative when I asked for a later checkout. Friendly and correct.

Too expensive for such services and location. 
WiFi is good.
Stylish, exceptional clean, great breakfast, ideally located to get to downtown or airport by bus or subway. Restaurant inside, Syrian / Arabic Cousine and local posh  around the corner

I stayed here the night before my wedding and the hotel was so accommodating - even giving me late check out free of charge. Lovely rooms, lovely staff, lovely location. Can't recommend it highly enough.

33.text:
Our stay in this hotel was not very pleasant and there's lots to improve. Upon arrival we were pretty shocked how unclean our two rooms (a single and a double) were. We counted several spiders with webs and the staff tried to explain this by saying that even with regular cleaning they would keep coming inside cause the hotel is surrounded by nature (I didn't see any more spiders though for the next 4 days after the room was cleaned properly). My bed frame cover had a clearly visible blood stain on it and in my colleague's room it smelled like someone had emptied a whole bottle of cheap room freshener. After having spoken to the manager, she gathered her cleaning staff, and in front of us they were discussing who was to blame for this. It was highly unprofessional from the manager's side and telling your staff off in front of your guests is an absolute no go. I only had a tiny handtowel in my bathroom and after asking if I could get a bigger one I was told that they were a bit short of the big ones the day my room was made ready. I was too astounded to react to this very curious excuse. Anyway my friends were offered another room which was a better standard and my room was thoroughly cleaned which made a big difference and we got the first night for free as an apology.

Unfortunately this wasn't quite the end of the story. The hotel was booked as an official exhibition hotel and when we got back from the first day at the fair (which ends at 11pm) the bar was already closed. One can only wonder why you as a business would close your bar so soon when you are fully aware that 90 percent of your guests will only return around midnight. The next day we returned from the exhibition hungry and wanted to eat at the restaurant. On their homepage it clearly states that the kitchen is preparing food until 10pm. We were there 9.30pm and the receptionist told us that the kitchen would always close at 8.30pm. She made us feel like we were the idiots who didn't know that and she wouldn't even apologise after we read her the info from their own homepage. 

All in all one can say that we experienced a curious stay and witnessed some poorly business choices which might cost this hotel the next official exhibition booking.
Good and Quiet, wifi high speed gym free, thx for everything
Das Frühstück ist sehr einfallslos und es gibt kaum frisches. Zum Abendessen ist das Restaurant auch nicht besonders gut, mein Schnitzel war eine Schuhsohle. Die Zimmer sind okay.
Fantastic place to stay if you visit Hamburg and want to play some tennis too.
Tennis, meal or a party, everything is good

34.text: Lovely traditional hotel / bar set in Nice surroundings. The staff are friendly. The food great. The beer even better. Prices reasonable to. Food sized, clean room. Bed not the comfyist though. But not bad.
It was okay. Had a nice seat, but the dinner was not good. The bread old, the steak well done instead of medium rare and oversalted. We will not go there again!

Absoluter Geheimtipp! Wir hatten zwei wundervolle Tage in und um Hamburg gebucht und da wir Abends noch Hunger hatten, Sind wir ins Restaurant Cortes gegangen. Der Hirschkalbsbraten war unbeschreiblich lecker. hier wird mit ganz viel Liebe (auch zum Detail) gekocht!!! PS das gesamte essen, die Mitarbeiter - einfach alles war absolut perfekt 😊🍀⚓️

Sehr gemütliches Restaurant und nettes Personal. Leider wenig Auswahl an vegetarischen Gerichten - hieran könnte man arbeiten. ;-) Und leider etwas unflexibel, wenn man an den Beilagen etwas ändern möchte. Alles in allem aber trotzdem ein nettes und gutes Restaurant und auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen.

35.text:
Very nice surrounding as in a quiet village.
Friendly staff and very nice food.
They also have a mini crazy golf should the weather be good enough to enjoy some outdoor fun
Nice staff, tidy rooms and good food
The Room is small and only has a single Bed with a small TV. The Bed is comfortable. The breakfast is a bit spartan es well so I'd say the hotel is a bit overpriced.
Very nice hotel, with excellent restaurant.

36.text: So much nature, good to relax at the bakery near to the hotel( braakermühle), which is amazing for a quality time!!!
Cheap and old. Need a renovation
hotel clean but very old. rather style 90s bed not very comfortable. very good food restaurant. outside purely and a nice design.

37.text: A very fine and exceptional hotel and experience. The service is very professional, the restaurant and breakfast meets all expectations, and the accommodations are worthy of the highest ratings. Very highly recommended during anyone's visit to Ahrensburg.
Very good place. Good food. Friendly people. Can recommend

Needs an update, beds are uncomfortable and the breakfast is not what it once was.

On a very positive note, the people who work here are great.  Helpful, great attitude and in general just good people.

As I understand there is a new chef that came in late 2017.
A beautiful and decent place to stay. Choice of food is good in the restaurant. In front of hotel you can see Ahrensburg palace.

38.text: Sehr angenehm war die 24h reception da ich erst spät nachts angekommen bin. Zimmer sind ok... nichts besonderes aber sauber. Etwas laut da auch spät nachts noch leute rein und rausgehen und man alles mitbekommt was auf dem flur passiert. War für mich wunderbar für eine Nacht, da günstig und man nach mitternacht noch einchecken kann, aber längere aufenthalte würde ich persönlich hier nicht verbringen wollen
Nice, but the heater in the room I stayed didn't function even after complaining
Super cool a blend of hotel and forest. You can enjoy the birds singing. Breakfast is okay for HH.

Quiet clean place with good breakfast
Also fine restaurant 
Friendly people

First of all, very friendly staff. Unfortunately, the rest of the package is not as good. Outdated rooms, very small size, old bed, tiny (!) TV, no Minibar. No cleaning or new towels on second day (was a Friday, not weekend). Not great.

39.text: Stayed for coffee and cake. Room was prepared nice, coffee was good, cake as well. Personell friendly, nice towards our kids
Clean room with a nice bathroom. Kind and helpful receptionists who for some reason kept giving us packs of Mentos. Their breakfast was good.
Was there for a Workshop. Great Service. Good And clean restrooms.
It was the best Hotel. I had all things, that I needed for the days when I was there!

Überraschend gut !!!
hiermit hatten wir nun wirklich nicht gerechnet weil das Hotel Maack eher für Geschäfsreisende bekannt ist. Aber die Küche ist mutig mit dem würzen und hat eine gute Qualität. Sie kann mit wirklich guten Restaurants locker mithalten. Der Service ist nett und unaufdringlich. Es würde ein schöner Abend und wir kommen gerne wieder. Ganz großes Lob an Herrn Macken und seinem Team!

40.text: Excellent restaurant, crafted food, attention to detail, personalized service. Best meal ever in Germany!

41.text: Nice place, good good. Prices are a little high due to quality and location
Very nice, clean hotel.  Would recommend to anyone.  Very good breakfast.  Staff also spoke English well, which was nice for us.  Dinners were also very good.
Best local food in Bergedorf and surroundings
Nette Bedienung und gutes Essen. Meine Erwartungen wurden erfüllt.

42.text: Beautiful hotel, very nice staff, delicious food and a nice selection of good beers. They have made me feel very welcome and have taken care of all my needs. Worth a visit if not staying.
The rooms are nice and the service is good!
Fantastic regional/local food with a twist and a 5 star service.

Hier fühlt man sich einfach wohl.
Sehr gemütliches  Hotel  und super nettes  Personal.
Die Zimmer sind sehr schön im Landhausstil eingerichtet  und alles ist sehr  sauber. Das Fühstücksbufett lässt keine Wünsche  offen.
Ich komme sehr gern hier her und kann es nur weiter empfehlen.

43.text: Lovely hotel, nice warm, clean rooms. Fabulous customer service. Would highly recommend
In the north edge of Hamburg, lovely hotel in a nice and quite village, good quality, good price, great breakfast. 25 min to the centre by sub. Love it.

Excellent hotel is a very nice place, very good service and hospitality , staff are very helpful.  There is absolutely no noise in this area which gives way to great sleep.  The breakfast is very good and I will return one day and recommend this hotel to everyone.
Well service, good athmospere for working.

44.text: The staff is super friendly and welcoming. Breakfast is good and with a variety of food. The swimming pool is free of charge, you can even get slippers and a bathrobe at the reception, free of charge. The pool is a little cold which is fine if you first warm up in the sauna! The rooms are outdated and small though, you can hear your neighbours very well. It was clean, but they missed some cobwebs which looks sloppy. The area is quiet and a kind of park lays next to it which is excellent for a nice stroll.

Nice Restaurant, best view on the Alster river.
If you are ever in the northern part of Hamburg and would like to enjoy something from here, go there and enjoy. We had a good time!
Ists a nice place to eat and drink, with a very quiet surrounding. We had a long walk after our visit.

45.text: It was incredible cheap, but the service was great! Comfy bed, rich breakfast, big room and we even had a whirlpool :D

Very nice overnight stay in apartment halfway Netherlands and Denmark. Clean room, good bathroom, equiped kitchen. Beds meet standard and Hotel provides free babybeds. Apartment is located few hundred meter away from hotel itself. Breakfast complete and value for money. We would book again next time.
Friendly Staffel, very professional. Room clean and quiet. Breakfast super.
Nice rooms, good kitchen, good price

46.text: Ganz klar gesagt gibt es bessere Hotels.  Es ist nicht auf dem neusten Stand,  kostet aber auch dafür nicht soviel.  Es ist aber dafür herzlich und steht auch dazu.  Es vermittelt eine schöne Dörflichkeit von früher,  da wo die Menschlichkeit einfach ehrlich geblieben ist.  Natürlich ist heute der Standard auf Perfekt getrimmt.  Doch hier ist es anders,  wie in schönen alten Zeiten die ich vermisse.  Deshalb kann ich sagen das es für uns gewohnten Zeit es nicht bewerten sein darf. Daumen hoch von mir.

Zimmer war dreckig. Dusche vergammelt und Abflüsse riechen stark. Decke war schimmlig und den Boden konnte man nicht ohne Schuhe betreten. Desweiteren waren die Betten total durch gelegen und man hatte immer Angst das es unter einem zusammenbricht wenn man sich bewegt. 

Einen Stern gibt es trotzdem für die Nettigkeit und der Gastfreundschaft der Angestellt.

Kleines, in die Jahre gekommene Hotel mit rustikaler Einrichtung. Eher Absteige als Hotel. Aber herzlich vom Inhaber geführt.
Parkplätze direkt am Haus. Preis-Leistung in Ordnung. Frühstück gut.
Die Putzfrau hat sicher Jahresurlaub. Unsauber, in die Jahre gekommene Unterkunft. Aber gratis Parkplatz. Mehr positives gibt's leider nicht.
Nettes Hotel ruhig, wenn auch an einer recht stark befahrenen Straße gelegen.

47.text: Old worn down hotel with friendly staff. If you're a light sleeper and wake up from traffic or railroad noise...don't stay here.

Hotel jest zaniedbany jak by czekal na swój koniec, lecz pościel i ręczniki czyste. Taki typowy hotel robotniczy, zapomniany przez wlaścicieli OBSŁUGA REWELACYJNA Pan z recepcji jest SUPER Profesjonalnie podchodzi do klijentów by rozwiązać problem gdy wyniknie

Das Hotel ist das letzte was ich je erlebt habe. Dusche im Zimmer geht nicht. Toilette auf dem Flur ist dreckig. Fernsehen ist nicht möglich. Alles in allem von den Bildern und hinweisen im Internet nicht zu vergleichen. Das kann man nicht Hotel nennen...

48.text:
Truly Horrible.
The one star is for good German beers (available everywhere). I went with some work colleagues and investors to have a drink and show the "traditional" German experience. Service was SHOCKING! We were asked to move because the unreserved table was needed, but the restaurant was empty. There were only two other groups there. I politely asked in German if we could stay and we would be happy to move if a larger group came in. The waitress glared at me and left, refusing to serve us. We had to order at the bar.
I will never take clients, friends, acquaintances, or anyone else there again.
Very tasty dishes, well presented, good size, pleasant atmosphere and very friendly, personal service. Really recommended!
Great local atmosphere next to the Hamburg Elbe river lakes or I'll say ponds since I'm from Erie Pennsylvania
Friendly waiter and good food at affordable prices.
Bear drinker? If yes, it may be one of the best places for you...

49.text: The Labskaus is a really good and a local specialty if it's your first time in Hamburg. They have some lovely, mild oysters (in fact they're the oldest German oyster serving restaurant) and the rooms have a lovely, quaint, private atmosphere. Up front there's a bakery for cake and brownies, as well as an excellent gift shop. Go there for high quality, local foodie presents.
A gorgeous spot for brunch, we were in Hamburg for a long weekend and went twice! Great range on the menu, reasonable prices. Lovely atmosphere and fantastic staff.
The food was so good! There wasn't really anything that wasn't delicious except for a cheese dessert that definitely requires a certain pallet to enjoy.

Amazing Old Trading House in Hamburg, converted into a fine restaurant with impressive fresh and tasty food. Lunch and dinner rooms are quite separated so it gives good intimacy and very relaxed atmosphere. I got the recommendation to go and taste the white spring asparagus, and it was utterly unexpected the great taste and texture of those asparagus combined with ham and boiled potatoes. Everything cooked at the perfect point. Highly recommended. Make sure to call for reservation. Enjoy.

What a wonderful evening, sitting outside and a delicious meal with attentive service. We choose the Summer menu and where not disappointed. Delicious 3 course meal with trout, pork chop or sea bass and absolutely yummy dessert. The pictures tell it all. Check it out for sure.

50.text: Nice food available for a large family gathering but staff were but very friendly and there were not enough seats or tables when we arrived. Nice location with a lake outside which was nice to walk around though. Old fashioned decor.

I was not a guest in the hotel itself but I was enjoying the lake and the small park area behind the hotel building. You're able to walk there with your dog or get together with your friends to have a barbecue at the little barbecue station. It's a nice place to take a few minutes for calming down.
Very outdated, but still up to modern standard. Nice vanity mirror in the bathroom, big rooms with a good bed. Great breakfast and very nice staff. We took a stroll in the park and it were lovely.
Very clean. Great staff, great food and drinks.

51.text: Nice people. Old Furniture. But OK

52.text: Sehr nett gelegenes kleines Hotel mit sehr eingerichteten Zimmern. Das Personal ist sehr nett und zuvorkommend
Very nice hotel with high standard.
We always come back to this place when we need rooms to stay

53.text: Your standard Chinese restaurant kind of place. Kind and attentive staff.

Food was quite good. 
Service from the waiter was horrible. 
I would gladly give for stars but with this service i can’t give more than 2 stars... really horrible attitude!
Great selection of tasty food, friendly staff. Not too expensive either.

54.text:
Ein wundervolles Ambiente mit einer einladenden Atmosphäre.
Zimmer sind sehr schön und gemütlich eingerichtet. Das Frühstück ist sehr gut.

Schönes kleines Hotel in Bergedorf. Auch hier kurzfristig gebucht und ein schönes und ruhig gelegenes Zimmer bekommen.
Abends gab es ein sehr leckeres Buffet mit typisch norddeutscher Küche. (Grünkohl mit Pinkel) 
Das Frühstück am morgen war gut und reichhaltig. Nichts zu beanstanden.
Das erste Hotel dass ich anrufe wenn ich nach Hamburg muss.

Sehr gemütliches, kleineres, privat geführtes Hotel mit sehr freundlichen und hilfsbereiten Inhabern und  Mitarbeitern. Das Restaurant lässt sich durch eine Tür teilen, so dass hier auch kleinere Konferenzen möglich sind. Konferenztechnik ist auch vorhanden. Ideal für Besprechungen außerhalb der gewohnten Büroräume. Fazit: Hat mir sehr gefallen - werde das Hotel jetzt öfter mal für Seminare und Konferenzen nutzen und empfehlen.
Der Standort ist nicht gerade autofreundlich, aber dafür hat man es schön ruhig. Also ich habe mich auch dank der Angestellten wohlgefühlt.

55.text: Beautiful place. Very nice waiters who speak english and good beer. Prices are not as expensive as I expected for such a tourist spot. Bathrooms are extremely clean. Much better than I expected.

The beer is good and the food arrives fast but the food is bad. It is expensive, comes in small portions in comparison to other German restaurants like the HB. The Chips (Fries) are frozen and arrived cold. The price of a Spanferkelkrustenbraten is very high and the portion is too small. In other places you get the whole pigs elbow. My ribs where dry and overcooked and the coleslaw tasteless. DON'T COME HERE, TOURIST TRAP!!!! The quality of the food is bad and overpriced.
very nice location, the restaurant is very spacious. the beers are quite tasty and the food was simple and fresh

Pretty good food but the beer is the main attraction. We weren't able to book a tour unfortunately, but settled for lunch here. It's a little pricey but it's right on the water front, so that was expected.

There's a friendly vibe and the waiters are pretty attentive even at busy times. All in all a good lunch in a nice location.
Nice place. View to harbour area from rooftop. Good beer and tasty food!

56.text: Very authentic atmosphere, beautiful marroquin design and delicious meals, but a bit pricey concept

Amazing! Great food, great environment, very nice and skilled wait staff. If you're in Hamburg for a visit, please try to go here, but you will need reservations, so be sure to call ahead of time. Don't work if you can't speak German, they speak English and Moroccan and other languages too.
Im morrocan and this is very good traditional marocain cousine👌 service was over the top ❤

Very interesting experience. Flavourful food adapted for the german palette. 90% of the deserts were german. Serious Minus points for overpriced drinks and lack of acceptance of any kind of credit card. Accepting MasterCard or visa is the price of doing buisness. Businesses all over the world have accepted this. German businesses still a bit slow on the uptake it seems.
Amazing venue and restaurant... try the mint tea!

57.text:
In a long time the worst thing that I experienced in a restaurant. One of us ordered a special "slow cooked pork". When he got it it was 80% grease and 20% meat. Of course we asked the waiter if it was correctly prepared and he said yes. He didn't even ask the cook and it was clearly understandable that we weren't satisfied at all. I really want to emphasis that this is unacceptable in a very expensive restaurant like this.

The waiter wasn't very nice. It would be ok for a normal restaurant, but for these expensive prices I expect a certain level of friendliness. 

Last, we reserved a table outside, but got a table inside. Yes it was a little cold, but we wouldn't mind. They hadn't even set the tables outside.
Always a great place for dining and and an enjoyable evening.

An okay place for groups to go to. Close to the lake and beautiful outside. 
The food wasn't the best but still okay.
The staff was always helpful and very friendly. 
Even the kids had a nice time due to the beautiful surroundings.
Will definitely think about going here again for our next big event.
The prices are a bit too high, but manageable.

It’s a sunny day and surly pretty hot of course.
Lake view is great and chill.
Tomato soup is very special, and it’s white!!!
Beef is a bit dry and over done.
Fish is ok.
Writers are very nice.

The meat and fish was really well done and there is some quite interesting ideas to be found (like tuna in sesame crust with wasabi banana), the staff is doing a great job and the drinks and desserts are just fine. I wouldn't mind the pretty high prices, if only the "side-dishes", meaning the vegetables mostly, would stand up to quality of everything else. It is a shame, really, cause otherwise the Leuchtturm could be an excellent restaurant.

58.text: Hotel room has a nice size and it is clean. But the rooms are quite noisy. There is a road with quite a lot of traffic in front of the hotel, and besides that the Hamburg airport is not very far and some airplanes fly over the hotel when landing. Breakfast is quite basic, but it is good enough. It is located in an outside area of the city, but still there are several restaurants in the hotel surroundings. Connection with the city center is easy with public transport (bus).

People are nice, Internet is free and ok, but not great, rooms are clean. It's quite off the beaten path, no great food options are close. The rooms are clean, big enough. Overall, it's fine for the price.

Been there now and then with our Princess for one day project and the crew. The hotel is OK - it just worked for us. However, there is always a problem - and the tragic part is that no one wants to take responsibility. Last time I have been, I tried to check out the group of 23 - as I said I was traveling on a major photo assignment​ - and even getting the invoice was a problem.

Most recently I helped my buddy Greg Gorman, a superstar in the photographic world. His room was so cold he wanted to leave a day early and asked if we could check out early with no charge for the coming night. "Not a problem at all" the friendly lady at the check out confirmed - after all, it was just before nine am.

Of course,​ the hotel charged us - and accuses Greg and his and my assistant to lie. Sorry, that's too much. We will not go again.

Mercure Hotel Hamburg am Volkspark is a good hotel, good location for who intend to visit Hamburgo. The front desk was friendly giving us information about the area.  Check in and Check out were good. Excellent cost benefit, I recommend it.

This hotel has it's qualities, but also some down sides. The location is very good and there is a bus station very near by. The staff is very nice and the parking is free. The rooms are spacious and offer everything one needs on a business trip, except a LAN socket. What bothered me though was the bath room. The water in the sink barely drained, the shower head and hose should have been renewed ages ago (room 611). Also the cleaning staff did not do a good job in the bath room, found some hair here and there that was not mine and some fairly dusty places. The room itself was ok. So except for the bath room, I was happy with my stay.

59.text: Great Portuguese food and a lovely atmosphere 😍 The house red is excellent! 🍷
Extremely cool place with excellent service and live music.
Best restaurant in Hamburg hands down! I truly recommend it. Do yourself a favor and order the fish platter. Simply exquisite.
Possibly the best Portuguese and generally the best restaurant in Hamburg. Outstandingly friendly staff and great food quality. Great wine. Always again.

Great place, cozy atmosphere and good food. Staff is very friendly (English/Portuguese/German speakers), great live music too. The price is very reasonable for what you get & one of my favorite places in that neighborhood

vicinity.31: Holiday Inn Express Hamburg-St. Pauli Messe, Simon-von-Utrecht-Straße 39, Hamburg
vicinity.40: Steinbecker Straße 111, Buchholz in der Nordheide
